Articles.Content:
Howdy,

I'm currently playing KSP with multiple mods focused progression realism.  I would like to start using MecJeb to place my ships in Kerbin orbit now but I can't for the life of me find out when I will get the capability that allows that feature.

I've already landed on multiple bodies and sent countless ships into the system, but I still haven't unlocked the ascent guidance module.

Does anyone know?

 

Thanks!

TGC
You need to unlock "unmanned tech", tier 7.
There is a MM script, somewhere on this forum, that allow all the MJ features to any pod and probe core without having the dedicated MJ part on your ship. It also unlock everything from the start.
